page.title: 03ROAD HAZARDS OF BILBROOK.
page.content: Many villagers in Bilbrook believe that the lanes and even the main road are hazardous. The main road appears to be too dangerous to cope with sets of t- raffic. Many pets and wild animals have had their lives come to an end on these badly equiped roads The road has had petitions put against it. But these petitions did not succeed. Soon after these petitions were turned down a very sad incident occured,a young girl named Joanne, aged 18 was killed due to someone else overtaking co- ming the other way because of the road being to narrow.Many motorcy- clists have also been killed after driving into tractors etc.
